snippet.title: Konami GB Collection Vol. 4 - Antarctic Adventure (Hard) [GBC] - Real Time Longplay (No death)
snippet.description:
This is a, no commentary, Longplay of Antarctic Adventure for Game Boy Color, played on Hard (level 3). The game is part of Konami GB Collection Vol. 4. No death run.

Note: To unlock level 3, you first need to finish the game in level 2. This video directly starts from the last level since game is basically the same. The increase in difficulty is also minor, maybe a few extra seals/holes, but nothing extraordinary.

---------------------------------------------------------------------
Game is played by me in one go. No save states/cheats have been used. Recorded in VBA23.2.

Please note I uploaded it just for fun, no intention to compete anyone.
